name: Insiders (itch) (hanzemeng)
description:
Trapped inside a labyrinth, vulnerable and helpless.
May you discover and make use of the peculiar apparatus lying inside.
For this is the only path to salvation.
The clock is ticking, make haste.

Control

  • w/a/s/d to move
  • q/e to select different items
  • Left click to interact
  • Right click to cancel
  • Left shift + p to return to main menu

    • Important Note

  • This game only supports resolution of 1920*1080 or higher.
